headline: Rtx (RTX): Defense and Aerospace Giant Sees Growth Amid Global Tensions
summary: Recently we took a detailed look at the Top 10 Trending Stocks and Rtx Corporation (NYSE:RTX) was one of the stocks that were highlighted in that article. headline: RTX Clinches a Deal to Support ESSM and NSMS Programs
summary: RTX's unit Raytheon secures a contract for engineering and technical services in support of the ESSM and NSMS programs.
